title: Decentralized World Data Bank
description: Centralized nations are beginning to lose power to tech giants and the centralization of global power is increasing.
solution: Decentralized world data bank that acts as a central bank, but for data borrowing and lending. People can make wealth from their mined data.
experience: B.S Biochemistry, Economics, Psychology. Primarily in all my research areas, I was involved in the collection and categorization of data.
